chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: Praise ye the LORD. Blessed is the man that feareth the LORD, that delighteth greatly in his commandments.
items.plainText: Praise ye the LORD. Blessed is the man that feareth the LORD, that delighteth greatly in his commandments.

items.text: His seed shall be mighty upon earth: the generation of the upright shall be blessed.
items.plainText: His seed shall be mighty upon earth: the generation of the upright shall be blessed.

items.text: Wealth and riches shall be in his house: and his righteousness endureth for ever.
items.plainText: Wealth and riches shall be in his house: and his righteousness endureth for ever.

items.text: Unto the upright there ariseth light in the darkness: he is gracious, and full of compassion, and righteous.
items.plainText: Unto the upright there ariseth light in the darkness: he is gracious, and full of compassion, and righteous.

items.text: A good man sheweth favour, and lendeth: he will guide his affairs with discretion.
items.plainText: A good man sheweth favour, and lendeth: he will guide his affairs with discretion.

items.text: Surely he shall not be moved for ever: the righteous shall be in everlasting remembrance.
items.plainText: Surely he shall not be moved for ever: the righteous shall be in everlasting remembrance.

items.text: He shall not be afraid of evil tidings: his heart is fixed, trusting in the LORD.
items.plainText: He shall not be afraid of evil tidings: his heart is fixed, trusting in the LORD.

items.text: His heart is established, he shall not be afraid, until he see his desire upon his enemies.
items.plainText: His heart is established, he shall not be afraid, until he see his desire upon his enemies.

items.text: He hath dispersed, he hath given to the poor; his righteousness endureth for ever; his horn shall be exalted with honour.
items.plainText: He hath dispersed, he hath given to the poor; his righteousness endureth for ever; his horn shall be exalted with honour.

items.text: The wicked shall see it, and be grieved; he shall gnash with his teeth, and melt away: the desire of the wicked shall perish.
items.plainText: The wicked shall see it, and be grieved; he shall gnash with his teeth, and melt away: the desire of the wicked shall perish.
